sections.title: Section 1: 1. This is how you keep your costs under control even
1. This is how you keep your costs under control even
summary_points: Wingo offers flexible travel options for managing mobile costs abroad, which can be activated and managed via the myWingo customer portal or the Wingo Cockpit.
Users can monitor their data and call usage anytime in myWingo, set roaming limits, and access information about country-specific rates through the roaming tool.
Wingo Mobile subscriptions support Full Speed 5G on 5G-capable devices using the Swisscom network, except for Wingo Prepaid plans.

Specific subscriptions like Wingo Swiss and Wingo Europe Pro offer varying levels of international data and call benefits, with travel options available for additional usage outside their coverage zones.

quiz_questions.question: What is the minimum duration you must book a travel option with Wingo before it can be canceled daily?
quiz_questions.explanation: Travel options with Wingo must be booked for at least 30 days before you can cancel them daily. This ensures users have enough time to utilize the service effectively.

quiz_questions.question: Which tool can you use to check the cost of calling between countries and find country group zones?
quiz_questions.explanation: The Roaming Tool in myWingo provides information about country group zones and the cost of calling between countries, making it easy to plan international usage.

quiz_questions.question: What is the data limit for Wingo Europe Pro before speed is reduced?
quiz_questions.explanation: Wingo Europe Pro includes 40 GB of data in the EU/UK at full speed. After this limit, the speed is reduced to 200 kbit/s.

quiz_questions.question: Which of the following subscriptions does NOT support Full Speed 5G?
quiz_questions.explanation: All Wingo Mobile subscriptions support Full Speed 5G except for Wingo Prepaid. Users with prepaid plans cannot access this option.

quiz_questions.question: What network does Wingo use to provide its services?
quiz_questions.explanation: Wingo services operate on the ultra-fast Swisscom network, offering excellent coverage and speed for its users.
